channel.title: California Probate Code Podcast (Smart Fallback)
channel.description: AI-generated podcast featuring California court decisions on probate code interpretation and application. Full-length episodes using smart fallback neural voice synthesis with zero token truncation and complete legal opinion content. Features intelligent re-chunking for oversized text segments to ensure perfect audio quality and complete content preservation.
